profile:
Mr. Interlock Landscape & Construction is a professional residential and commercial design and build firm servicing the York Region and Greater Toronto Area communities.
 
With over 30 years of experience in interlocking and paving installations, we help our clients create a distinctive design element that will magnify their homes allure, increase its value while offering a unique look customized to meet their landscape desires.
 
We take pride in providing our clients with original and timeless designs, innovative ideas, quality construction, prompt and professional service, outstanding warranty and seamless flow of project implementation from start to finish.
 
Our construction expertise spans across a variety of materials from natural stone, flagstone, marble to cobblestones, standard pavers, concrete and asphalt.
 
We also specialize in a variety of project types such as driveways, patios, stairs, retaining walls, swimming pools, outdoor kitchenettes, outdoor living spaces, outdoor lighting, outdoor audio and more.
 
Our mission is to enhance and beautify the communities we enter by supplying our clients with a uniquely designed landscape project that adheres to our motto "Do It Once, Do It Right". All while providing our clients with unparalleled service through our consultation, planning and execution resulting in long lasting relationships and an abundance of word of mouth referrals.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
We can help you to stand out as a proud homeowner, make your home shine, and show your unique style.
 Marcio Marciano is proudly servicing the Ottawa area for both residential and commercial projects with: Bricklaying for new homes and restorations, Interlocking stone, patios, retaining walls, landscaping, and garden – (brickwork, stonework), tuckpointing, artificial stones, chimney restoration work, and cultured stone projects. 
We provide free onsite and phone consultations and look forward to sitting down and discussing your project with you in further detail. 

We are open for business from Monday to Sunday  with Summer Hours: 6:00 AM – 6:00 PM and Winter Hours 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM

MASONRY AND BRICKLAYING ALL WINTER!
